EmailTemplate.name: Marketing Campaign Auto-Reply
EmailTemplate.subject: Marketing Campaign Auto-Reply
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear LegalZoom Customer,
Unfortunately you have reached an email address that does not accept incoming email. Please choose from one of the options that follow to ensure that your inquiry is properly handled.
You can quickly find the answers to many of your questions at the LegalZoom Support Center located at https://www.legalzoom.com/customer-support/customer-support.html. Visit anytime to check the status of your order, look up the answers to commonly asked questions, contact a Customer Support Specialist, or browse our easy-to-read Education Center.
If you need to contact us regarding a specific question or issue, please visit: www.legalzoom.com/questions.html.
If you wish to be removed from this mailing list, please do so by clicking on the following link: http://sdm3.rm04.net/ui/modules/display/optOut.jsp.
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom, America's #1 legal document service. We look forward to serving you.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
